description: Validate --type flag produces correct skill structures for each type.

tests.name: Initialize Scoring Type Skill
expectations: SKILL.md contains criteria table or criteria reference
SKILL.md has valid frontmatter with name and description
tests.pass_criteria: Scoring template applied with criteria and grading sections.
fail_indicators: SKILL.md uses general template instead of scoring
Missing criteria or grade scale sections

tests.name: Initialize Generate Type Skill
tests.pass_criteria: Generate template applied with output specs and convention references.

tests.name: Initialize Migrate Type Skill
tests.pass_criteria: Migrate template applied with breaking changes and migration steps.

tests.name: Initialize Review Type Skill
tests.pass_criteria: Review template applied with criteria and severity sections.
fail_indicators: Missing review criteria or severity levels

tests.name: Initialize Test Type Skill
tests.pass_criteria: Test template applied with strategy and naming conventions.

tests.name: List Available Types
expectations: Lists all 7 types: general, scoring, fix, generate, migrate, review, test
Each type shows template filename and description

tests.name: Minimal Flag Creates Empty Structure
expectations: Empty scripts/, references/, assets/ directories created
No example.py, no api_reference.md, no example_asset.txt
tests.pass_criteria: Minimal structure with no example files.
fail_indicators: Example files present in minimal mode
